original: Nanu bhagavā dvipadānaṁ aggo, dvipadānaṁ seṭṭho, dvipadānaṁ pamokkho, dvipadānaṁ uttamo, dvipadānaṁ pavaro asamo asamasamo appaṭisamo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggaloti?
Hañci bhagavā dvipadānaṁ aggo, dvipadānaṁ seṭṭho, dvipadānaṁ pamokkho, dvipadānaṁ
uttamo, dvipadānaṁ pavaro asamo asamasamo appaṭisamo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo, tena vata re vattabbe—
sīlena samādhinā paññāya, tena vata re vattabbe—
Buddhena seṭṭho ca samo ca vijjati;
Na vattabbaṁ buddhassa dinnaṁ mahapphalantikathā niṭṭhitā.
